issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Looks like there was an error when upgrading the DB wrt images. After the upgrade I see this (upgrade.log attached):

root@ip-10-0-1-51:/storage/workspace/eutester# euca-describe-images
DescribeImagesType: 
Expected: a collection containing <class com.eucalyptus.images.ImageInfo>
     but: was <class com.eucalyptus.component.Faults$CheckException>, was <class com.eucalyptus.empyrean.ServiceId>, was <class com.eucalyptus.empyrean.ServiceStatusDetail>, was <class com.eucalyptus.images.BlockStorageImageInfo>, was <class com.eucalyptus.images.DeviceMapping>, was <class com.eucalyptus.images.KernelImageInfo>, was <class com.eucalyptus.images.MachineImageInfo>, was <class com.eucalyptus.images.RamdiskImageInfo>, was <class com.eucalyptus.network.NetworkGroup>, was <class com.eucalyptus.network.NetworkPeer>, was <class com.eucalyptus.network.NetworkRule>, was <class com.eucalyptus.vm.VmInstance>, was <interface com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceConfiguration>
root@ip-10-0-1-51:/storage/workspace/eutester# 



During the upgrade I see this:

fields.summary: Upgrade: Failure to upgrade image tables

comments.body: Fixed the basic image metadata, though I still need some code to test things like launch permissions and product codes.  If there are still issues with that, I'd like to have a separate issue with code to test it.
Verified this fix. Will open another bug if launch permissions have issues.
